name: Not-so Frosty The Snowman
description:
Candy canes and snowflakes? Nope. It's raining fire!

Are you fast enough?

Controls :
-A, D/Arrow keys to move left and right.
-Space to jump.

Dodge fires, collect ice, but most importantly... don't melt!

Awesome music by Yahtzei, you can find more of his stuff at http://yahtzei.newgrounds.com/
